Key Match Events: Jared McCain’s 34-point performance against the Cleveland Cavaliers.
Adem Bona pulled down nine rebounds, tying for the team high.
Adem Bona scored four points on put-back layups and blocked a shot.
Pre-Game Insights: Joel Embiid was managing his knee in the second night of a back-to-back.
Andre Drummond came down with an illness hours before the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Nurse commented on Adem Bona's performance, stating he was lively and didn't make many mistakes.
Adem Bona expressed his readiness to play at any given moment and credited his practice with Embiid and Drummond for his progress.
Jared McCain and Adem Bona have developed a close relationship, bonding over their faith and supporting each other.
